content: k4 row 13 k4 slm k to 3 sts before m k2tog k1 slm k2 p1 k1 p4 slk2p k1 row 14 p2tog bind off 3 k1 p1 k3 slm p to m slm k4 repeat row 1-14 the same number of times you did for the increase section on the last repeat knit row 13 and 14 as follows row 13 k4 slm k2tog slm k2 p1 k1 p4 slk2p k1 row 14 p2tog bind off 3 k1 p1 k3 remove m p1 remove m k4 you should have 11 stitches remaining finishing knit 4 row in garter stitch bind off block adore rs knit ssk ws purl yarn over k2tog no stitch slk2p rs purl ws knit bind off rs & ws knit thru p2tog front & back loops
